data.value: An input array describing the input at each time T.  Linear interpolation is used between given times.  If there are multiple inputs, then each column of the rank-2 array represents an input.  If U is not given, the input is assumed to be zero.
The time steps at which the input is defined and at which the output is desired.  The default is 101 evenly spaced points on the interval [0,10.0].

to simulate an analog Bessel filter applied to a signal.
